const response = await client.security.putRole({
  name: "test_role7",
  indices: [
    {
      names: ["*"],
      privileges: ["read"],
      field_security: {
        grant: ["a.*"],
        except: ["a.b*"],
      },
    },
  ],
});
console.log(response);

    {
      names: ["*"],

      field_security: {
        grant: ["a.b*"],
